overview: The disappearance of homeland and the dislocation of memory make us question eternity and the meaning of home. A long-existing lifestyle disappears suddenly and people cannot figure out whether man or the nation will conquer nature through rapid development. We can only believe in a better tomorrow because we have no choice. The last image of our homeland is a broken river and a disappearing town, and it is also the last elegy for our past.
title: River . Town
